mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sign(class_id, user_id, course_id, date, status, reason) VALUES(#{classId}, #{userId}, #{courseId}, #{date}, #{status}, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT sign_id, class_id, user_id, course_id, date, status, reason FROM sign WHERE user_id = #{userId}
